properties.areaDesc: Coastal Waters from Stonington, ME to Port Clyde, ME out 25 NM; Coastal Waters from Port Clyde, ME to Cape Elizabeth, ME out 25 NM
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued February 13 at 3:00AM EST until February 14 at 6:00PM EST by NWS Gray ME
properties.description:
* WHAT...Winds gusting to 25 KT and seas 3 to 5 feet expected.

* WHERE...Coastal waters from Port Clyde, ME to Stonington, ME
out to 25 NM.

* WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to 6 PM EST Friday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 6 PM EST FRIDAY... ...SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IS CANCELLED
